TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit EmulateRecognizeCompletedEventArgs extends System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs

summary.span: 提供 和 類別的 事件資料。

span.span: Provides data for the event of the and classes.

MemberSignature.Value: Public ReadOnly Property Result As RecognitionResult

Attribute.AttributeName: get: System.Runtime.TargetedPatchingOptOut("Performance critical to inline this type of method across NGen image boundaries")

span.span: Gets the results of emulated recognition.

value.span: 有關辨識結果的詳細資訊，或者為（如果發生錯誤）。

span.span: Detailed information about the results of recognition, or if an error occurred.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 物件衍生自和包含片語辨識作業所傳回的完整資訊。The object derives from and contains full information about a phrase returned by a recognition operation. 您可以取得關閉所有辨識候選項目從清單屬性。You can obtain a list off all the recognition candidates from the property. 如果辨識器遇到辨識作業期間發生例外狀況屬性設定為例外狀況和屬性設定為`null`。If recognizer encounters an exception during the recognition operation, the property is set to the exception and the property is set to `null`.
